content.question: Antitrust laws are intended to

choices.label: prevent the entry of firms into imperfectly competitive markets
ensure that firms produce the allocatively efficient quantity of output
control monopolies and maintain a competitive market environment

content.answer: control monopolies and maintain a competitive market environment

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

topic.text: 6.4: The Effects of Government Intervention in Different Market Structures

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
